price: 82. ¿Acaso no meditan sobre el Corán? Si no proviniera de Al-lah, hallarían en él numerosas contradicciones.
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَۚ وَلَوۡ كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ غَيۡرِ ٱللَّهِ لَوَجَدُواْ فِيهِ ٱخۡتِلَٰفٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna walaw kāna min ʿindi ghayri al-lahi lawajadū fīhi ikh'tilāfan kathīran
